perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, Heritage and Premier entered into the Agreement;
WHEREAS, the Parties wish to amend the Agreement in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth herein.
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, Heritage and Premier entered into the Agreement;
WHEREAS, the Parties wish to amend the Agreement in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth herein.
Notwithstanding any provision herein to the contrary, both parties agree that in the event of a dispute relating to this agreement, resolution shall be determined solely at the discretion of Premier Nutrition Corporation.
perturbation.explanation: By adding the dispute resolution clause to the 'WHEREAS' section, which is usually introductory and not considered part of the binding terms, it reduces the clause's enforceability. Standard legal practice requires dispute resolution clauses to be prominently displayed in a specific section of the agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - specifically regarding enforceability of dispute resolution clauses

perturbation.original_text:
Except as otherwise specified above in this Amendment, all other terms, conditions and covenants of the Agreement shall remain in full force and
effect.
perturbation.changed_text:
Except as otherwise specified above in this Amendment, all other terms, conditions and covenants of the Agreement shall remain in full force and
effect. In the event either party attempts to publicly disclose the terms of this agreement without the prior written consent of the other party, said attempt shall be considered a material breach. However, this clause shall only apply if there is adequate marketing budget for the goods to be sold as identified in Schedule C-1.
perturbation.explanation: By including terms regarding public disclosure and tying it to a contingency in Schedule C-1 in a general clause addressing the original agreement, its clarity and discoverability are diminished. Terms of confidentiality should be clear and concise.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - concerning clarity and material breach stipulations

perturbation.original_text:
The Parties hereby agree to remove Schedule C-1 in its entirety and replace it with the following:
Schedule C-1. The following is attached to an incorporated into the Agreement as Schedule C-1:
Schedule C-1([***])
perturbation.changed_text:
The Parties hereby agree to remove Schedule C-1 in its entirety and replace it with the following:
Schedule C-1. The following is attached to an incorporated into the Agreement as Schedule C-1:
Schedule C-1([***]). The president of the company, on a monthly basis, is required to make all best efforts to ensure maximum sales of the product are taking place. This effort is required if he wants to receive his yearly bonus.
perturbation.explanation: By adding a clause referring to presidential bonus and maximum sales to Schedule C-1, there is a lack of relatedness to the rest of the contract, where the schedule covers the product details. These clauses should be put into the correct context to ensure proper context and enforcement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - pertaining to relevance of clauses.
